title: pmp_sub_02_non_operational_after_activation
summary: Submersible pump activated and then removed after no operation observed.
description: Image records submersible pump PMP-SUB-02 after being activated for approximately 10 minutes. Pump was observed as non-operational and removed from water source. Cause not determined at time of record.

external_reference.note: External image reference showing pump after removal.
